data.title: Ramanaidus death: Jagan & Chandrababus response
meta_keywords: Chandrababu naidu and Jagan Condolences to Ramanaidu
CM Chandrababu naidu and Jagan Condolences to Ramanaidu
data.meta_description: Veteran producer Daggubati Rama Naidu died after prolonged illness at a private hospital in Hyderabad on Wednesday. Apart from cinema industry several celebrities from Political arena also mourned for...
data.text:
Veteran producer Daggubati Rama Naidu died after prolonged illness at a private hospital in Hyderabad on Wednesday. Apart from cinema industry several celebrities from Political arena also mourned for death of the legendary producer.

AP Chief Minister Chandrababu naidu took twitter to express his condolences to Daggubati family. He Tweeted ‘’Deeply saddened over the passing of Movie Mogul D. Ramanaidu. A legendary producer whose outstanding contribution to cinema is immeasurable’’

Other side opposition leader and YSR Congress party chief YS Jagan Mohan Reddy expressed deep shock at the demise of movie moghul.YS Jagan in his statement to media Rama Naidu had created history by producing more than 150 movies in 13 languages.

Jagan said Rama Naidu was a great human being and won the respect of everyone. AHe called Rmanaidu as good human being with humility and felt he was a role model for many.Jagan said Rama Naidu's demise caused him immense pain.
